Cryptoparty Washington, D.C.

About Us Events

Who We Are

Cryptoparty DC is a local edition of the global digital security community. This is a community-driven, community-owned learning group. We do not make money. We do not endorse products. We prefer the F/OSS solution, when it makes sense, over the commercially available.

Code for DC

Cryptoparty is a learning group part of [Code for DC](https://codefordc.org). We invite members of our community, regardless of technical background, who are interested in digital security.

Unite

We get people together who are interested in digital security.

Empower

The Internet is everyone's space and we have a right to our own privacy.
